achievements.title: Institute Level Python Skills Competition 2025
achievements.description: Successfully participated and passed the Institute Level Python Skills Competition 2025, demonstrating strong problem-solving ability, programming fundamentals, and practical application of Python in a competitive academic environment.
features: Participated in Skills Competition 2025 representing the 7th Semester, CST.
Demonstrated proficiency in Python programming, including logical problem solving and coding accuracy under time constraints.
Evaluated by the official Evaluation Committee under the ASSET Project.

achievements.title: Best Web Developer Award 2024
achievements.description: Awarded for outstanding contribution in web development and creating innovative solutions that impacted thousands of users.
features: Developed 10+ full-stack applications using MERN stack.
Improved application performance by 45% through optimization.
Mentored 15+ junior developers in modern web technologies.
Led a team of 8 developers in building an enterprise-level project.

achievements.title: Hackathon Winner - National Level
achievements.description: Won 1st place in National Hackathon 2024 by building an AI-powered task management system with real-time collaboration features.
features: Built a full-stack application in 48 hours with a team of 4.
Implemented AI-based task prioritization and scheduling.
Created real-time collaboration features using WebSockets.
Presented to a panel of 10+ industry experts and received 95/100 score.

achievements.title: Full Stack Development Certification
achievements.description: Completed intensive 6-month full-stack web development bootcamp covering MERN stack, achieving 98% score and building 15+ projects.
features: Mastered React, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.
Built and deployed 15+ real-world projects.
Learned modern development tools: Git, Docker, AWS.
Achieved top 5% ranking among 500+ students.

achievements.title: Open Source Contributor Badge
achievements.description: Recognized as an active open-source contributor with 500+ contributions across multiple repositories and 10+ merged pull requests.
features: Contributed to 15+ open-source projects on GitHub.
Fixed 50+ bugs and implemented new features.
Received 500+ stars across personal repositories.
Collaborated with developers from 20+ countries.

achievements.title: Community Service Award
achievements.description: Awarded for organizing 5+ free coding workshops and helping 100+ students learn programming through mentorship programs.
features: Organized 5+ free coding workshops for beginners.
Mentored 100+ students in web development.
Created free educational content viewed by 10,000+ people.
Built a community of 500+ aspiring developers.
